item.description:
We have been meaning to do this for a while now so come out to the Natives first ever Book Club event and meet a distinguished author.

Red Sox Native Steve Masse wrote and published an award winning book, "A Jolly Good Fellow" on November 26 2007.

Please join Steve and a couple of other invited Book Clubs at Bestsellers Cafe in Medford Square to discuss the book and meet the author.

Steve mixes suspense and humor in relaying the story of Duncan Wagner, a self-styled charity Santa Claus with a thoroughly planned kidnapping plot up his sleeve, and Gabriel Booker, the boy who turns that plot upside-down.

I have read the book and it is an easy read.

Location is T Bus accessible 94,95,96,134,126 buses

All Natives in Book Clubs are welcome to invite others and cross post. Please E mail Steve if others are being invited.

Hope to see you there on Patriots Bye week and the day after daylight savings time ends.

 

Fenway Frank
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Event Hosts Steve and Lynne
item.name: A Jolly Good Fellow by Red Sox Native Stephen Masse- Book Club
